title: EP117: Bootyhole Starter Kit Feat Dad Hats and Bowties Pod
itunes:title: EP117: Bootyhole Starter Kit Feat Dad Hats and Bowties Pod
description:
During this week's episode the duo add some testosterone to the room and are joined by the hosts of the Dad Hats and Bowties Podcast. Weezy shares her trip with Scissors to Panama for Memorial Day Weekend while Mandii briefly mentions her sex-less trip to Vegas. Find out her new celebrity crush and more. The duo were bamboozled by the guys when they realize neither host has been pegged but has an interesting story about him enjoying booty play. They delve into the bootyhole starter kit stating why and how a woman can get the goodies from a male counterpart. During the Vanilla Sh-t segment, somehow Mandii's foot ends up in someone's mouth and things get wild. Follow this week's guest on social media @dadhatsandbowties @xabmusic @distinguishthegod Want to support Whoreible Decisions? Become a patron and receive 3 bonus episodes per month at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions Share your thoughts on this week's episode on Twitter and use #whoreibledecisions or tag @whoreiblepod Follow the show on IG @whoreible_decisions and the hosts Mandii @fullcourtpumps & Weezy @Weezywtf

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
